entry.title: Silicon Valley’s elites can’t be trusted with the future of AI. We must break their dominance–and dangerous god complex
entry.quote: Altman and his Silicon Valley peers are the wrong ones to lead us into the AI future because they are largely driven by profit, disconnected from the world’s realities, and often suffer from a serious god complex.

entry.title: VWFNDR™ — 003
entry.quote: A series of concept camera explorations by an open collective of photo nerds. Ideations on new hardware, UX and interface design paradigms. straight to your inbox. Guided by passion and ruled by feasibility.

entry.title: Your dream car is a privacy nightmare
entry.quote: Rampant data collection and vague policies mean drivers essentially surrender their anonymity just to get behind the wheel, according to a scathing report from Mozilla.

entry.title: In Memoriam: John Warnock (1940–2023)
entry.quote: A Mathematician With An Artist’s Eye

entry.title: Apple vs Meta: The Illusion of Privacy
entry.quote: A walk through of the on-boarding process for Threads, and the hidden privacy implications
